analyzed: sammukhāḥ mettam kāyakammam nāma therānam pana pāda dhovana bījana vāta dāna ādi bhedam pi

original: sabbaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ sammukhā mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Ubhayehipi dunnikkhittānaṃ dārubhaṇḍādīnaṃ
analyzed: sabbam sāmīcikammam sammukhā mettam kāya kammam nāma ubhayehi pi dunnikkhittānam dāru bhaṇḍa ādīnam

original: nāma. Ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyoti ayaṃ mettākāyakammasaṅkhāto dhammo saritabbo satijanako;
analyzed: nāma ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ ti ayam mettā kāya kamma saṅkhāto dhammo saritabbaḥ sati janako

original: yo naṃ karoti, taṃ puggalaṃ; yesaṃ kato hoti, te pasannacittā “aho sappuriso”ti anussarantīti
analyzed: yaḥ nam karoti tam puggalam yesam kato hoti te pasanna cittāḥ aho sappuriso ti anussaranti iti

original: adhippāyo. Piyakaraṇoti taṃ puggalaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyaṃ karoti. Garukaraṇoti taṃ
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ piya karaṇā iti tam puggalam sabrahmacārīnam piyam karoti garu karaṇā iti tam

original: Tehi saddhiṃ avivādāya samaggabhāvāya ekībhāvāya ca saṃvattati.
analyzed: tehi saddhim avivādāya samagga bhāvāya ekībhāvāya ca saṃvattati

original: Mettaṃ vacīkammantiādīsu devatthero tissattheroti evaṃ paggayha vacanaṃ sammukhā
analyzed: mettam vacīkamman ti ādīsu deva tthero tissa ttheraḥ iti evam paggayha vacanam sammukhā

original: kuhiṃ amhākaṃ tissatthero, kadā nu kho āgamissatī”ti evaṃ mamāyanavacanaṃ parammukhā

original: Ekakavāravaṇṇanā
321. Āpattikarā dhammā jānitabbātiādimhi ekuttarikanaye āpattikarā dhammā nāma cha

original: nayo. Kāyena vuṭṭhātīti tiṇavatthārakasamathena vuṭṭhāti. Kāyaṃ acāletvā vācāya desentassa
analyzed: nayo kāyena vuṭṭhāti iti tiṇavatthāraka samathena vuṭṭhāti kāyam a cāletvā vācāya desentassa

original: vācāya vuṭṭhāti. Vacīsampayuttaṃ kāyakiriyaṃ katvā desentassa kāyena vācāya vuṭṭhāti
analyzed: vācāya vuṭṭhāti vacī sampayuttam kāya kiriyam katvā desentassa kāyena vācāya vuṭṭhāti

analyzed: catukka vāra vaṇṇanā

analyzed: chacattālīsa sikkhāpadāni tehi anāpattiyā iva hoti dutiya catukke pana yassā bhikkhuniyā

original: tehi anāpattiyeva hoti.

original: Upāsako sīlavāti pañca vā dasa vā sīlāni gopayamāno.

original: nāma. Mando pana momūho momūhattā eva “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni dīpetvā vuttanayeneva

original: ukkoṭento mohāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma. Sace pana dvīsu attapaccatthikesu
analyzed: ukkoṭentaḥ moha āgatim gacchantaḥ adhikaraṇam ukkoṭā iti nāma sace pana dvīsu atta paccatthikesu

original: eko visamāni kāyakammādīni gahanamicchādiṭṭhiṃ balavante ca pakkhantariye abhiññāte
analyzed: ekaḥ visamāni kāya kamma ādīni gahanam icchādiṭṭhim balavante ca pakkhantariye abhiññāte

original: bhikkhū nissitattā visamanissito gahananissito balavanissito ca hoti, tassa bhayena
analyzed: bhikkhū nissita ttā visama nissitaḥ gahana nissitaḥ balava nissitaḥ ca hoti tassa bhayena

original: “ayaṃ me jīvitantarāyaṃ vā brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā kareyyā”ti “adhammaṃ dhammo”tiādīni
analyzed: ayam me jīvita antarāyam vā brahmacariya antarāyam vā kareyyāti adhammam dhamma uti ādīni

original: dīpetvā vuttanayeneva ukkoṭento bhayāgatiṃ gacchanto adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti nāma.
analyzed: dīpetvā vutta nayena iva ukkoṭentaḥ bhaya āgatim gacchantaḥ adhikaraṇam ukkoṭa iti nāma

original: Tadahupasampannoti eko sāmaṇero byatto hoti bahussuto, so vinicchaye parājayaṃ patvā
analyzed: ekaḥ sāmaṇeraḥ byattaḥ hoti bahu sutaḥ saḥ vinicchaye parājayam patvā

original: maṅkubhūte bhikkhū disvā pucchati “kasmā maṅkubhūtātthā”ti? Te tassa taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: maṅkubhūte bhikkhū disvā pucchati kasmā maṅkubhūta attha ati te tassa tam adhikaraṇaṃ

original: ārocenti. So te evaṃ vadeti “hotu, bhante, maṃ upasampādetha, ahaṃ taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: ārocenti saḥ te evam vada iti hotu bhante mam upasampādetha aham tam adhikaraṇam

original: vūpasamessāmī”ti. Te taṃ upasampādenti. So dutiyadivase bheriṃ paharitvā saṅghaṃ
analyzed: vūpasamessāmi iti te tam upasampādenti saḥ dutiya divase bherim paharitvā saṅgham

original: sannipāteti. Tato bhikkhūhi “kena saṅgho sannipātito”ti vutte “mayā”ti vadati. “Kasmā
analyzed: sannipāteti tatas bhikkhūhi kena saṅghaḥ sannipātitaḥ ti vutte mayā iti vadati kasmā

original: sannipātito”ti? “Hiyyo adhikaraṇaṃ dubbinicchitaṃ, tamahaṃ vinicchinissāmī”ti. “Tvaṃ
analyzed: sannipātitaḥ ti hiyyas adhikaraṇam dubbinicchitam tam aham vinicchinissāmi iti tvam

original: pana hiyyo kuhiṃ gato”ti? “Anupasampannomhi, bhante, ajja pana upasampannomhī”ti.
analyzed: pana hiyyas kuhim gataḥ ti an upasampannaḥ amhi bhante ajja pana upasampannomhi iti

original: So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, ‘tadahupasampanno
analyzed: saḥ vattabbaḥ idam āvuso tumhādisānam bhagavatā sikkhāpadam paññattam tadahu pasampanno

original: ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiya’nti, gaccha āpattiṃ desehī”ti. Āgantukepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ukkoṭa iti ukkoṭanakam pācittiyam ti gaccha āpattim desehi iti āgantuke pi esa eva nayaḥ

original: Kārakoti ekaṃ saṅghena saddhiṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinitvā pariveṇagataṃ parājitā bhikkhū
analyzed: kārakā uti ekam saṅghena saddhim adhikaraṇam vinicchinitvā pariveṇa gatam parājitāḥ bhikkhū

original: vadanti “kissa, bhante, tumhehi evaṃ vinicchitaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, nanu evaṃ vinicchinitabba”nti.
analyzed: vadanti kissa bhante tumhehi evam vinicchitam adhikaraṇam nanu evam vinicchinitabbanti

original: So “kasmā paṭhamaṃyeva evaṃ na vaditthā”ti taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ukkoṭeti. Evaṃ yo kārako
analyzed: saḥ kasmā evam evam na vadittha ati tam adhikaraṇam ukkoṭeti evam yaḥ kārako

original: ukkoṭeti, tassāpi ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ. Chandadāyakoti eko adhikaraṇavinicchaye
analyzed: ukkoṭeti tassa api ukkoṭanakam pācittiyam ekaḥ adhikaraṇa vinicchaye

original: chandaṃ datvā sabhāge bhikkhū parājayaṃ patvā āgate maṅkubhūte disvā “sve dāni ahaṃ
analyzed: chandam da tvā sabhāge bhikkhū parājayam patvā āgate maṅku bhūte disvā sve dāni aham

original: vinicchinissāmī”ti saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā “kasmā sannipātesī”ti vutte “hiyyo adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: vinicchinissāmi iti saṅgham sannipātetvā kasmā sannipātesi iti vutte hiyyas adhikaraṇam

original: dubbinicchitaṃ, tamahaṃ ajja vinicchinissāmī”ti. “Hiyyo pana tvaṃ kattha gato”ti.
analyzed: dubbinicchitam tam aham ajja vinicchinissāmi iti hiyyas pana tvam kattha gataḥ iti

original: “Chandaṃ datvā nisinnomhī”ti. So vattabbo “idaṃ āvuso tumhādisānaṃ bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: chandam da tvā nisinnaḥ amhi iti so vattabbo idam āvuso tumhādisānam bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ

original: paññattaṃ, ‘chandadāyako ukkoṭeti, ukkoṭanakaṃ pācittiya’nti, gaccha āpattiṃ desehī”ti.
analyzed: paññattam chanda dāyakaḥ ukkoṭa iti ukkoṭanakam pācittiyam ti gaccha āpattim desehi iti

original: Adhikaraṇanidānādivaṇṇanā
342. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ kiṃnidānantiādīsu kiṃ nidānamassāti kiṃnidānaṃ. Ko samudayo

original: assāti kiṃsamudayaṃ. Kā jāti assāti kiṃjātikaṃ. Ko pabhavo assāti kiṃpabhavaṃ. Ko
analyzed: assa ati kiṃsamudayam kā jāti assa ati kiṃjātikam kā upabhavaḥ assa ati kiṃpabhavam ko

original: sambhāro assāti kiṃsambhāraṃ. Kiṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ assāti kiṃsamuṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbānetāni
analyzed: sambhāraḥ assa ati kiṃsambhāram kim samuṭṭhānam assa ati kiṃsamuṭṭhānam sabbānetāni

original: kāraṇavevacanāniyeva.
analyzed: kāraṇa vevacana aniyā iva

original: Vivādanidānantiādīsupi aṭṭhārasabhedakaravatthusaṅkhāto vivādo nidānametassāti vivādanidānaṃ.
analyzed: vivāda nidāna nti ādīsu pi aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthu saṅkhātaḥ vivādaḥ nidānam etassa ati vivāda nidānam

original: Vivādaṃ nissāya uppajjanakavivādavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Anuvādo nidānaṃ assāti anuvādanidānaṃ.
analyzed: vivādam nissāya uppajjanaka vivāda vasena itam vuttam anuvādaḥ nidānam assa ati anuvāda nidānam

original: Idampi anuvādaṃ nissāya uppajjanakaanuvādavasena vuttaṃ. Āpatti nidānaṃ assāti āpattinidānaṃ.
analyzed: idam api anuvādam nissāya uppajjanaka anuvāda vasena vuttam āpatti nidānam assa ati āpatti nidānam

original: Āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā catasso āpattiyo āpajjatīti evaṃ āpattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakaāpattivasenetaṃ

original: vuttaṃ. Kiccayaṃ nidānamassāti kiccayanidānaṃ; catubbidhaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kāraṇamassāti
analyzed: vuttam kiccayam nidānam assa ati kiccaya nidānam catubbidham saṅgha kammam kāraṇam assa ati

original: attho. Ukkhittānuvattikāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanādīnaṃ kiccaṃ nissāya

original: uppajjanakakiccānaṃ vasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ catunnampi adhikaraṇānaṃ vissajjanapakkhe

original: ekapadayojanā. Etenānusārena sabbapadāni yojetabbāni.

original: Dutiyapucchāya hetunidānantiādimhi vissajjane navannaṃ kusalākusalābyākatahetūnaṃ

original: vasena hetunidānāditā veditabbā. Tatiyapucchāya vissajjane byañjanamattaṃ nānaṃ.
analyzed: vasena hetu nidāna ādi tā veditabbā tatiya pucchāya vissajjane byañjana mattam nānam

original: Hetuyeva hi ettha paccayoti vutto.
analyzed: hetuyā iva hi ettha paccayaḥ ti vutto

original: 343. Mūlapucchāya vissajjane dvādasa mūlānīti kodhaupanāhayugaḷakādīni cha vivādāmūlāni,

original: mūlāni. Cuddasa mūlānīti tāneva dvādasa kāyavācāhi saddhiṃ cuddasa honti. Cha mūlānīti
analyzed: mūlāni cuddasa mūlāni iti tān eva dvādasa kāya vācāhi saddhim cuddasa honti cha mūlāni iti

original: kāyādīni cha samuṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: kāya ādīni cha samuṭṭhānāni

original: Samuṭṭhānapucchāya vissajjane aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni samuṭṭhānāni, tañhi etesu
analyzed: samuṭṭhāna pucchāya vissajjane aṭṭhārasa bheda kara vatthūni samuṭṭhānāni tat hi etesu

analyzed: samuṭṭhānāni vuccanti esa nayo sabbattha

original: Na katamena samathenāti sāvasesāpatti viya na sammati. Na hi sakkā sā desetuṃ, na tato vuṭṭhāya suddhante patiṭṭhātuṃ.

original: 348. Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ hoti anuvādādhikaraṇantiādi nayo uttānoyeva.
analyzed: vivāda adhikaraṇam anuvāda adhikaraṇa iti ādi

original: 349. Tato paraṃ yattha sativinayotiādikā sammukhāvinayaṃ amuñcitvā cha yamakapucchā vuttā, tāsaṃ vissajjaneneva attho pakāsito.

analyzed: satta samatha nidāna vaṇṇanā

analyzed: nidānam bhaṇḍana jātānam adhikaraṇam vūpasametum a sakkuṇeyya tā yebhuyyasikāya nidānam

analyzed: mūla pucchāya vissajjanam uttānam eva samuṭṭhāna pucchāya kiñca api

analyzed: sabbattha uttānam eva ati

analyzed: dutiya gāthā saṅgaṇiyam codanā ati vatthuñca āpattiñca dassetvā codanā sāraṇā ati

original: tattha sannipatito saṅgho vinicchayapariggahaṇatthāya; dhammādhammaṃ tulanatthāya
analyzed: tattha sannipatitaḥ saṅghaḥ vinicchaya pariggahaṇa tthāya dhamma adhammam tulana tthāya

original: suvinicchitadubbinicchitaṃ jānanatthāyāti attho. Matikammaṃ pana pāṭiyekkanti suttantikattherānañca
analyzed: su vinicchita dubbinicchitam jānana tthāya ati atthaḥ mati kammam pana pāṭiyekkam ti

original: vinayadharattherānañca mantaggahaṇaṃ pāṭekkaṃ pāṭekkaṃ vinicchayasanniṭṭhāpanatthaṃ.
analyzed: manta ggahaṇam pāṭekkam pāṭekkam vinicchaya sanniṭṭhāpana ttham

original: Mā kho paṭighanti cuditake vā codake vā kopaṃ mā janayi. Sace anuvijjako tuvanti sace tvaṃ saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ nisinno vinayadharo.
analyzed: mā kho paṭighanti cuditake vā codake vā kopam mā janayi sace anuvijjakaḥ sace tvam saṅgha majjhe otiṇṇam adhikaraṇam vinicchitum nisinnaḥ vinaya dharo

original: Viggāhikanti “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādinayappavattaṃ. Anatthasaṃhitanti
analyzed: viggāhikam ti na tvam imam dhamma vinayam ājānāsi iti ādi naya ppavattam anattha saṃhitam

original: yā anatthaṃ janayati, parisaṃ khobhetvā uṭṭhāpeti, evarūpiṃ kathaṃ mā abhaṇi. Sutte
analyzed: yā anattham janayati parisam khobhetvā uṭṭhāpeti evarūpim katham mā abhaṇi sutte

original: vinaye vātiādīsu suttaṃ nāma ubhatovibhaṅgo. Vinayo nāma khandhako. Anulomo nāma
analyzed: vinaye vā ati ādīsu suttam nāma ubhatas vibhaṅgaḥ vinayaḥ nāma khandhakaḥ anulomaḥ nāma

original: parivāro. Paññattaṃ nāma sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ. Anulomikaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā.
analyzed: parivāraḥ paññattam nāma sakalam vinaya piṭakam anulomikam nāma cattāraḥ mahā padesā

original: Anuyogavattaṃ nisāmayāti anuyuñjanavattaṃ nisāmehi. Kusalena buddhimatā katanti chekena
analyzed: anuyogavattam nisāmayāti anuyuñjanavattam nisāmehi kusalena buddhimatā chekena

original: paṇḍitena ñāṇapāramippattena bhagavatā nīharitvā ṭhapitaṃ. Suvuttanti supaññāpitaṃ.
analyzed: paṇḍitena ñāṇa pārami pattena bhagavatā nīharitvā ṭhapitam su vuttan ti su paññāpitam

original: Sikkhāpadānulomikanti sikkhāpadānaṃ anulomaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva padattho, ayaṃ panettha sādhippāyasaṅkhepavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sikkhāpada ānulomikanti sikkhāpadānam anulomam ayam tāva padattho ayam pana ittha sa adhippāya saṅkhepa vaṇṇanā

original: – “sace tvaṃ anuvijjako, mā sahasā bhaṇi, mā anatthasaṃhitaṃ viggāhikakathaṃ bhaṇi.
analyzed: sace tvam anuvijjakaḥ mā sahasā bhaṇi mā anattha saṃhitam viggāhika katham bhaṇi

original: Yaṃ pana kusalena buddhimatā lokanāthena etesu suttādīsu anuyogavattaṃ kathaṃ supaññattaṃ
analyzed: yam pana kusalena buddhimatā lokanāthena etesu sutta ādīsu anuyogavattam katham su paññattam

original: sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ anulomaṃ, taṃ nisāmaya taṃ upadhārehī”ti. Gatiṃ na nāsento samparāyikanti
analyzed: sabba sikkhāpadānam anulomam tam nisāmaya tam upadhārehi iti gatim na na āsentaḥ samparāyikam ti

original: attano samparāye sugatinibbattiṃ anāsento anuyogavattaṃ nisāmaya. Yo hi taṃ anisāmetvā
analyzed: attanaḥ samparāye sugati nibbattim an āsentaḥ anuyogavattam nisāmaya yaḥ hi tam a nisāmetvā

original: anuyuñjati, so samparāyikaṃ attano gatiṃ nāseti, tasmā tvaṃ anāsento nisāmayāti attho.
analyzed: anuyuñjati saḥ samparāyikam attanaḥ gatim na āseti tasmai tvam an āsentaḥ nisāmaya ati attho

original: Idāni taṃ anuyogavattaṃ dassetuṃ hitesītiādimāha. Tattha hitesīti hitaṃ esanto gavesanto;
analyzed: idāni tam anuyogavattam dassetum hitesī iti ādim āha tattha hitesī iti hitam esantaḥ gavesantaḥ

original: mettañca mettāpubbabhāgañca upaṭṭhapetvāti attho. Kālenāti yuttapattakālena; ajjhesitakāleyeva
analyzed: mettañca mettā pubbabhāgañca upaṭṭhapetvā ti attho kālena ati yutta patta kālena ajjhesita kāleya iva

original: tava bhāre kate anuyuñjāti attho.
analyzed: tava bhāre kate anuyuñjāti attho

original: Sahasā vohāraṃ mā padhāresīti yo etesaṃ sahasā vohāro hoti, sahasā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ mā padhāresi, mā gaṇhittha.
analyzed: sahasā vohāram mā padhāresi iti yaḥ etesam sahasā vohāraḥ hoti sahasā bhāsitam tam mā padhāresi mā gaṇhittha

original: Paṭiññānusandhitena kārayeti ettha anusandhitanti kathānusandhi vuccati, tasmā paṭiññānusandhinā
analyzed: paṭiññā anusandhitena kāraya iti ettha anusandhitanti kathā anusandhi vuccati tasmā paṭiññā anusandhinā

original: kāraye; kathānusandhiṃ sallakkhetvā paṭiññāya kārayeti attho. Atha vā paṭiññāya ca
analyzed: kāraye kathā anusandhim sallakkhetvā paṭiññāya kāraya iti atthaḥ atha vā paṭiññāya ca

original: anusandhitena ca kāraye, lajjiṃ paṭiññāya kāraye; alajjiṃ vattānusandhināti attho.
analyzed: anusandhitena ca kāraye lajjim paṭiññāya kāraye alajjim vattā anusandhinā iti atthaḥ

original: Tasmā eva paṭiññā lajjīsūti gāthamāha. Tattha vattānusandhitena kārayeti vattānusandhinā
analyzed: tasmai eva paṭiññā lajjīsu iti gātham āha tattha vatta anusandhitena kāraya iti vatta anusandhinā

original: kāraye, yā assa vattena saddhiṃ paṭiññā sandhiyati, tāya paṭiññāya kārayeti attho.
analyzed: kāraye yā assa vattena saddhim paṭiññā sandhiyati tāya paṭiññāya kāraya iti atthaḥ

original: Sañciccāti jānanto āpajjati. Parigūhatīti nigūhati na deseti na vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: sañcicca ati jānantaḥ āpajjati parigūhati iti nigūhati na deseti na vuṭṭhāti

original: Sā ahampi jānāmīti yaṃ tumhehi vuttaṃ, taṃ saccaṃ, ahampi naṃ evameva jānāmi. Aññañca tāhanti aññañca taṃ ahaṃ pucchāmi.
analyzed: sā aham pi jānāmi iti yam tumhehi vuttam tam saccam aham pi nam evam eva jānāmi aññam ca tāhan ti aññam ca tam aham pucchāmi

original: Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purekathitañca pacchākathitañca na jānāti. Akovidoti tasmiṃ
analyzed: pubba aparam na jānāti iti pure kathitam ca pacchā kathitam ca na jānāti akovidaḥ ti tasmin

original: pubbāpare akusalo. Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivacanaṃ vinicchayānusandhivacanañca na jānāti.
analyzed: pubba apare akusalaḥ anusandhi vacana patham na jānāti iti kathā anusandhi vacanam vinicchaya anusandhi vacanam ca na jānāti

original: Sīlavipattiyā codetīti dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi codeti. Ācāradiṭṭhiyāti ācāravipattiyā
analyzed: sīla vipattiyā codeti iti dvīhi āpatti kkhandhehi codeti ācāra diṭṭhiyā ati ācāra vipattiyā

original: ceva diṭṭhivipattiyā ca. Ācāravipattiyā codento pañcahāpattikkhandhehi codeti, diṭṭhivipattiyā
analyzed: ca iva diṭṭhi vipattiyā ca ācāra vipattiyā codento pañcahā āpatti khandhehi codeti diṭṭhi vipattiyā

original: codento micchādiṭṭhiyā ceva antaggāhikadiṭṭhiyā ca codeti. Ājīvenapi codetīti ājīvahetupaññattehi
analyzed: codentaḥ micchādiṭṭhiyā ca iva antaggāhika diṭṭhiyā ca codeti ājīvena api codeti iti ājīva hetu paññattehi

original: chahi sikkhāpadehi codeti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: chahi sikkhāpadehi codeti sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Dutiyagāthāsaṅgaṇikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dutiya gāthā saṅgaṇika vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Codanākaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: codanā kaṇḍam

original: Anuvijjakakiccavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anuvijjaka kicca vaṇṇanā

original: 360-361. Idāni evaṃ uppannāya codanāya vinayadharena kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ anuvijjakenātiādi
analyzed: idāni evam uppannāya codanāya vinaya dharena kattabba kiccam dassetum anuvijjakena atiādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhenāti gāthāya ayamattho – ekeneko mātugāmena saddhiṃ
analyzed: āraddham tattha diṭṭham diṭṭhena ati gāthāya ayam attho ekena ikaḥ mātugāmena saddhim

original: ekaṭṭhānato nikkhamanto vā pavisanto vā diṭṭho, so taṃ pārājikena codeti, itaro tassa
analyzed: eka ṭhānataḥ nikkhamantaḥ vā pavisantaḥ vā diṭṭhaḥ saḥ tam pārājikena codeti itaraḥ tassa

original: dassanaṃ anujānāti. Taṃ pana dassanaṃ paṭicca pārājikaṃ na upeti, na paṭijānāti.
analyzed: dassanam anujānāti tam pana dassanam paṭicca pārājikam na upeti na paṭijānāti

original: Evamettha yaṃ tena diṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tassa “diṭṭho mayā”ti iminā diṭṭhavacanena sameti.
analyzed: evam ettha yam tena diṭṭham tam tassa diṭṭhaḥ mayā ati iminā diṭṭha vacanena sameti

original: Yasmā pana itaro taṃ dassanaṃ paṭicca dosaṃ na paṭijānāti, tasmā asuddhaparisaṅkito
analyzed: yasmai pana itaro tam dassanam paṭicca dosam na paṭijānāti tasmai a suddha parisaṅkito

original: hoti; amūlakaparisaṅkitoti attho. Tassa puggalassa “suddho aha”nti paṭiññāya tena
analyzed: hoti amūlaka parisaṅkito ti attho tassa puggalassa suddhaḥ ahanti paṭiññāya tena

original: saddhiṃ uposatho kātabbo. Sesagāthādvayepi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: saddhim uposatho kātabbo sesa gāthā dvaye pi esā iva nayo sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Anuvijjakakiccavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: anuvijjaka kicca vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Codakapucchāvissajjanāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: codaka pucchā vissajjanā vaṇṇanā

original: 362-363. Codanāya ko ādītiādipucchānaṃ vissajjane sacce ca akuppe cāti sacce patiṭṭhātabbaṃ
analyzed: codanāya kaḥ ādi iti ādi pucchānam vissajjane sacce ca akuppe ca ati sacce patiṭṭhātabbam

original: akuppe ca. Yaṃ kataṃ vā na kataṃ vā, tadeva vattabbaṃ, na ca codake vā anuvijjake
analyzed: akuppe ca yam katam vā na katam vā tat eva vattabbam na ca codake vā anuvijjake

original: vā saṅghe vā kopo uppādetabbo. Otiṇṇānotiṇṇaṃ jānitabbanti otiṇṇañca anotiṇṇañca
analyzed: vā saṅghe vā kopaḥ uppādetabbo otiṇṇa anotiṇṇam jānitabbanti otiṇṇam ca anotiṇṇam ca

original: vacanaṃ jānitabbaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ jānanavidhi – ettakā codakassa pubbakathā, ettakā pacchimakathā,
analyzed: vacanam jānitabbam tatra ayam jānana vidhi ettakā codakassa pubba kathā ettakā pacchima kathā

original: ettakā cuditakassa pubbakathā, ettakā pacchimakathāti jānitabbā. Codakassa pamāṇaṃ
analyzed: ettakā cuditakassa pubba kathā ettakā pacchima kathā ti jānitabbā codakassa pamāṇam

original: gaṇhitabbaṃ, cuditakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ, anuvijjakassa pamāṇaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ,
analyzed: gaṇhitabbam cuditakassa pamāṇam gaṇhitabbam anuvijjakassa pamāṇam gaṇhitabbam

original: anuvijjako appamattakampi ahāpento “āvuso samannāharitvā ujuṃ katvā āharā”ti vattabbo,
analyzed: anuvijjakaḥ appamattakam pi a hāpentaḥ āvuso samannāharitvā ujum katvā āharāti vattabbo

original: saṅghena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ
analyzed: saṅghena evam paṭipajjitabbam yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthu sāsanena tam

original: adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammatīti ettha dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā
analyzed: adhikaraṇam vūpasammati iti ettha dhammo ti bhūtam vatthu vinayo ti codanā ca iva sāraṇā

original: ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca. Etena hi dhammena ca
analyzed: ca satthu sāsananti ñatti sampadā ca iva anussāvana sampadā ca etena hi dhammena ca

original: vinayena ca satthusāsanena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamati, tasmā anuvijjakena bhūtena
analyzed: vinayena ca satthu sāsanena ca adhikaraṇam vūpasamati tasmai anuvijjakena bhūtena

original: vatthunā codetvā āpattiṃ sāretvā ñattisampadāya ceva anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: vatthunā codetvā āpattim sāretvā ñatti sampadāya ca iva anussāvana sampadāya ca tam adhikaraṇam

original: vūpasametabbaṃ, anuvijjakena evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Sesamettha uttānameva.
analyzed: vūpasametabbam anuvijjakena evam paṭipajjitabbam sesam ettha uttānam eva

original: 364. Uposatho kimatthāyātiādipucchāvissajjanampi uttānameva. Avasānagāthāsu there
analyzed: uposathaḥ kimatthāya ati ādi pucchā vissajjanam pi uttānam eva avasāna gāthāsu there

original: ca paribhāsatīti avamaññaṃ karonto “kiṃ ime jānantī”ti paribhāsati. Khato upahatindriyoti
analyzed: ca paribhāsati iti avamaññam karonto kim ime jānanti iti paribhāsati khataḥ upahata indriyā ti

original: tāya chandādigāmitāya tena ca paribhāsanena attanā attano khatattā khato. Saddhādīnañca
analyzed: tāya chanda ādi gāmitāya tena ca paribhāsanena saddhā ādīnam ca

original: indriyānaṃ upahatattā upahatindriyo. Nirayaṃ gacchati dummedho, na ca sikkhāya gāravoti
analyzed: upahata ttā upahata indriyaḥ nirayam gacchati dummedhaḥ na ca sikkhāya

original: so khato upahatindriyo paññāya abhāvato dummedho tīsu sikkhāsu asikkhanato na ca
analyzed: so khataḥ upahata indriyo paññāya abhāvataḥ dummedhaḥ tīsu sikkhāsu a sikkhanataḥ na ca

original: sikkhāya gāravo kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upagacchati, tasmā na ca āmisaṃ nissāya…pe…
analyzed: sikkhāya gāravaḥ kāyassa bhedā nirayam eva upagacchati tasmai na ca āmisam

original: yathā dhammo tathā kareti. Tassattho na ca āmisaṃ nissāya kare, cuditakacodakesu
analyzed: yathā dhammo tathā kare ti tassa atthaḥ na ca āmisam nissāya kare cuditaka codakesu

original: hi aññatarena dinnaṃ cīvarādiāmisaṃ gaṇhanto āmisaṃ nissāya karoti, evaṃ na kareyya.
analyzed: hi aññatarena dinnam cīvara ādi āmisam gaṇhantaḥ āmisam nissāya karoti evam na kareyya

original: Na ca nissāya puggalanti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”tiādinā nayena chandādīhi
analyzed: na ca nissāya puggalan ti ayam me upajjhāyaḥ vā ācariyaḥ vā ati ādinā nayena chanda ādīhi

original: gacchanto puggalaṃ nissāya karoti, evaṃ na kareyya. Atha kho ubhopete vivajjetvā
analyzed: gacchantaḥ puggalam nissāya karoti evam na kareyya atha kho ubho upete vivajjetvā

original: yathā dhammo ṭhito, tatheva kareyyāti.
analyzed: yathā dhammo ṭhito tathā iva kareyya ati

original: Upakaṇṇakaṃ jappatīti “evaṃ kathehi, mā evaṃ kathayitthā”ti kaṇṇamūle manteti. Jimhaṃ
analyzed: upakaṇṇakam jappati iti evam kathehi mā evam kathayittha ati kaṇṇa mūle manteti jimham

original: pekkhatīti dosameva gavesati. Vītiharatīti vinicchayaṃ hāpeti. Kummaggaṃ paṭisevatīti āpattiṃ dīpeti.
analyzed: pekkhati iti dosam eva gavesati vītiharati iti vinicchayam hāpeti kummaggam paṭisevati iti āpattim dīpeti

original: Akālena ca codetīti anokāse anajjhiṭṭhova codeti. Pubbāparaṃ na jānātīti purimakathañca pacchimakathañca na jānāti.
analyzed: akālena ca codeti iti anokāse an ajjhiṭṭhaḥ uva codeti pubba aparam na jānāti iti purima katham ca pacchima katham ca na jānāti

original: Anusandhivacanapathaṃ na jānātīti kathānusandhivinicchayānusandhivasena vacanaṃ na jānāti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: anusandhi vacana patham na jānāti iti kathā anusandhi vinicchaya anusandhi vasena vacanam na jānāti sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Codanākaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: codanā kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Cūḷasaṅgāmo
analyzed: cūḍasaṅgāmaḥ

original: Anuvijjakassa paṭipattivaṇṇanā
analyzed: anuvijjakassa paṭipatti vaṇṇanā

original: 365. Cūḷasaṅgāme saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunāti saṅgāmo vuccati adhikaraṇavinicchayatthāya
analyzed: cūḷasaṅgāme saṅgāma avacarena bhikkhunā ati saṅgāmaḥ vuccati adhikaraṇa vinicchaya tthāya

original: saṅghasannipāto. Tatra hi attapaccatthikā ceva sāsanapaccatthikā ca uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ
analyzed: saṅgha sannipātaḥ tatra hi atta paccatthikā ca iva sāsana paccatthikā ca uddhammam ubbinayam

original: satthu sāsanaṃ dīpentā samosaranti vesālikā vajjiputtakā viya. Yo bhikkhu tesaṃ paccatthikānaṃ
analyzed: satthu sāsanam dīpentā samosaranti vesālikāḥ vajjiputtakāḥ viya yaḥ bhikkhu tesam paccatthikānam

original: laddhiṃ madditvā sakavādadīpanatthāya tattha avacarati, ajjhogāhetvā vinicchayaṃ
analyzed: laddhim madditvā saka vāda dīpana tthāya tattha avacarati ajjhogāhetvā vinicchayam

original: pavatteti, so saṅgāmāvacaro nāma yasatthero viya. Tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā
analyzed: pavattā iti so saṅgāmāvacaraḥ nāma viya tena saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā

original: saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo. Nīcacittenāti mānaddhajaṃ
analyzed: saṅgham upasaṅkamantena nīca cittena saṅghaḥ upasaṅkamitabbaḥ nīca cittena ati mānaddha jam

original: nipātetvā nihatamānacittena. Rajoharaṇasamenāti pādapuñchanasamena; yathā rajoharaṇassa
analyzed: nipātetvā nihata māna cittena rajoharaṇa samena ati pāda puñchana samena yathā rajoharaṇassa

original: saṃkiliṭṭhe vā asaṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne neva rāgo na doso; evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
analyzed: saṃkiliṭṭhe vā a saṃkiliṭṭhe vā pāde puñchiyamāne na iva rāgaḥ na dosaḥ evam iṭṭha aniṭṭhesu

original: arajjantena adussantenāti attho. Yathāpatirūpe āsaneti yathāpatirūpaṃ āsanaṃ ñatvā
analyzed: a rajjantena a dussantena ati atthaḥ yathāpati rūpe āsane iti yathāpati rūpam āsanam ñatvā

analyzed: nānāvidham tam tam anattha katham a kathentena a tiracchāna kathikena ati diṭṭha suta mutam pi

analyzed: bhikkhu tathārūpim katham kathetum pahoti so vattabbo āvuso saṅgha majjhamhi pañhe

original: uppanne tvaṃ katheyyāsī”ti. Ariyo vā tuṇhībhāvo nātimaññitabboti ariyā tuṇhī nisīdantā

original: nisīditabbanti attho.
analyzed: nisīditabbanti atthaḥ

original: Na upajjhāyo pucchitabboti “ko nāmo tuyhaṃ upajjhāyo”ti na pucchitabbo. Esa nayo

analyzed: palibodha tthāya palibodhaḥ vinicchaya tthāya ati vinicchayam pāpana tthāya

analyzed: citta vippaṭisāra abhāvaḥ dubbalā taruṇa pīti pītīti balavā bahala pīti passaddhi iti

original: Vimuttiñāṇadassananti paccavekkhaṇāñāṇaṃ. Vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti

original: Mantanāti vinayamantanā eva. Upanisāti ayaṃ “vinayo saṃvaratthāyā”tiādikā paramparapaccayatāpi

original: etadatthāya; apaccayaparinibbānatthāya evāti attho.

original: 367. Anuyogavattagāthāsu paṭhamagāthā vuttatthā eva.

analyzed: na jānāti iti padena sambandhaḥ akovidaḥ ti padassa sa ve tādisako ti iminā sambandhaḥ

analyzed: vipattim na jānāti sattavidham āpattim na jānāti idam sikkhāpadam asukasmim nāma

original: pubbāparaṃ na jānāti, “idaṃ kataṃ idaṃ akata”nti katākataṃ na jānāti. Samena cāti

analyzed: tena iva pubba aparam a jānanassa samena aññāṇena kata akatam na jānāti iti vuttam hoti

original: vuttaṃ, tattha ākāraakovidoti kāraṇākāraṇe akovido. Iti yvāyaṃ vatthuādīnipi na jānāti,
analyzed: vuttam tattha ākāra akovidaḥ ti kāraṇa akāraṇe akovidaḥ iti yvā ayam vatthu ādīni pi na jānāti

original: ākārassa ca akovido, sa ve tādisako bhikkhu apaṭikkhoti vuccati.
analyzed: ākārassa ca a kovidaḥ sa ve tādisakaḥ bhikkhu apaṭikkho ti vuccati

original: Kammañca adhikaraṇañcāti imesampi padānaṃ “na jānātī”ti padeneva sambandho. Ayaṃ
analyzed: kammam ca adhikaraṇam ca ati imesam pi na jānāti iti padena iva sambandhaḥ ayam

analyzed: a samattha tāya nijjhattiyā ca a kovidaḥ attanaḥ sadisāya parisāya laddha ttā laddha pakkho

analyzed: yojanā nayaḥ vutta nayena iva veditabbo ti

analyzed: cūḷasaṅgāma vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Mahāsaṅgāmo
analyzed: mahā saṅgāmaḥ

original: Voharantena jānitabbādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: voharantena jānitabba ādi vaṇṇanā

original: sañcarittaṃ vuttaṃ. Kāyasaṃsaggādittayaṃ sarūpeneva vuttaṃ. Iti imāni pañca methunadhammassa

original: pubbabhāgo pubbapayogoti veditabbāni.
analyzed: pubba bhāgaḥ pubba payogaḥ ti veditabbāni

original: 376. Cattāri apalokanakammānīti adhammenavaggādīni. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Iti cattāri catukkāni soḷasa honti.
analyzed: cattāri apalokana kammāni iti sesesu pi esā iva nayo iti cattāri catukkāni soḷasa honti

original: Agatiagantabbavaṇṇanā
analyzed: agati agantabba vaṇṇanā

original: 379. Bahujanaahitāya paṭipanno hotīti vinayadharena hi evaṃ chandādigatiyā adhikaraṇe
analyzed: bahu jana ahitāya paṭipanno hoti iti vinayadharena hi evam chanda ādi gatiyā adhikaraṇe

original: vinicchite tasmiṃ vihāre saṅgho dvidhā bhijjati. Ovādūpajīviniyo bhikkhuniyopi dve

analyzed: bhāgāḥ honti upāsakāḥ api upāsikāyaḥ api dārakāḥ api dārikāyaḥ api tesam ārakkha devatā api tathā iva

analyzed: tena vuttam bahu jana ahitāya paṭipannaḥ hoti pe dukkhāya deva manussānaṃ ti

original: 382. Visamanissitoti visamāni kāyakammādīni nissito. Gahananissitoti micchādiṭṭhiantaggāhikadiṭṭhisaṅkhātaṃ gahanaṃ nissito. Balavanissitoti balavante abhiññāte bhikkhū nissito.
analyzed: visama nissitaḥ ti visamāni kāya kamma ādīni nissitaḥ gahana nissitaḥ oti micchādiṭṭhi antaggāhika diṭṭhi saṅkhātam gahanam nissitaḥ balava nissitaḥ ti balavante abhiññāte bhikkhū nissitaḥ

original: 393. Tassa avajānantoti tassa vacanaṃ avajānanto. Upayogatthe vā sāmivacanaṃ, taṃ avajānantoti attho.
analyzed: tassa avajānanto ti tassa vacanam avajānantaḥ upayoga atthe vā sāmi vacanam tam avajānantaḥ iti attho

original: 394. Yaṃ atthāyāti yadatthāya. Taṃ atthanti so attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
analyzed: yam atthāya ati yad atthāya tam attham ti saḥ attho sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

original: Mahāsaṅgāmavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: mahāsaṅgāma vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kathinabhedaṃ
analyzed: kathina bhedam

original: Kathinaatthatādivaṇṇanā
403. Kathine – aṭṭha mātikāti khandhake vuttā pakkamanantikādikā aṭṭha. Palibodhānisaṃsāpi pubbe vuttā eva.
404. Payogassāti cīvaradhovanādino sattavidhassa pubbakaraṇassatthāya yo udakāharaṇādiko
analyzed: payogassa ati cīvara dhovana ādino sattavidhassa pubbakaraṇassa atthāya yaḥ udaka āharaṇa ādiko

analyzed: payogo tassa payogassa katame dhammā anantara paccayena paccayo ti anāgata vasena

original: anantarā hutvā katame dhammā paccayā hontīti attho. Samanantarapaccayenāti suṭṭhu
analyzed: anantarā hutvā katame dhammā paccayāḥ honti iti attho samanantara paccayena ati suṭṭhu

original: anantarapaccayena, anantarapaccayameva āsannataraṃ katvā pucchati. Nissayapaccayenāti
analyzed: anantara paccayena anantara paccayam eva āsannataram katvā pucchati nissaya paccayena ati

original: uppajjamānassa payogassa nissayaṃ ādhārabhāvaṃ upagatā viya hutvā katame dhammā paccayā
analyzed: uppajjamānassa payogassa nissayam ādhāra bhāvam upagatāḥ viya hutvā katame dhammāḥ paccayā

original: hontīti attho. Upanissayapaccayenāti upetena nissayapaccayena; nissayapaccayameva
analyzed: honti iti attho upanissaya paccayena ati upetena nissaya paccayena nissaya paccayam eva

analyzed: upagatataram katvā pucchati purejāta paccayena ati iminā paṭhamam uppannassa paccaya bhāvam

analyzed: pucchati pacchājāta paccayena ati iminā pacchā uppajjanakassa paccaya bhāvam pucchati

original: Sahajātapaccayenāti iminā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjamānānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ pucchati.
analyzed: sahajāta paccayena āti iminā apubbam acarimam uppajjamānānam paccaya bhāvam pucchati

original: Pubbakaraṇassāti dhovanādino pubbakaraṇassa. Paccuddhārassāti purāṇasaṅghāṭiādīnaṃ
analyzed: pubbakaraṇassa ati dhovana ādino pubbakaraṇassa paccuddhārassa ati purāṇa saṅghāṭi ādīnam

analyzed: paccuddharaṇassa adhiṭṭhānassa ati kathina cīvara adhiṭṭhānassa atthārassa ati kathina tthārassa

original: Mātikānañca palibodhānañcāti aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ dvinnañca palibodhānaṃ. Vatthussāti
analyzed: mātikānam ca palibodhānam ca ati aṭṭhannam mātikānam dvinnam ca palibodhānam vatthussa ati

original: saṅghāṭiādino kathinavatthussa; sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: saṅghāṭi ādino sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Evaṃ yañca labbhati yañca na labbhati, sabbaṃ pucchitvā idāni yaṃ yassa labbhati,
analyzed: evam yat ca labbhati yat ca na labbhati sabbam pucchitvā idāni yam yassa labbhati

analyzed: tat eva dassentaḥ pubba karaṇam payogassa ati ādinā nayena vissajjanam āha tassa atthaḥ

analyzed: yam vuttam payogassa katame dhammā tiādi tattha vuccate pubba karaṇam payogassa

analyzed: anantara paccayena paccayaḥ samanantara nissaya upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ payogassa

analyzed: hi sattavidham pi pubbakaraṇam yasmā tena payogena nipphādetabbassa pubbakaraṇassa atthāya

analyzed: hoti payoge sati pubbakaraṇassa nipphajjanato tena vuttam payogaḥ pubbakaraṇassa

analyzed: purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ ti pacchājāta paccayam pana labhati tena vuttam pubbakaraṇam

analyzed: payogassa pacchājāta paccayena paccayo ti pacchā uppajjanakassa hi pubba karaṇassa

analyzed: atthāya so payogo sahajāta paccayam pana mātikā pali bodhā nisaṃsa saṅkhāte

analyzed: pannarasa dhamme ṭhapetvā aññaḥ payoga ādīsu ekaḥ api dhammo na labhati te eva hi pannarasa

analyzed: payogo kiṃnidānaḥ tiādīsu pucchā dvaya vissajjanesu hetu nidāno paccaya nidāno ti

original: ettha cha cīvarāni hetu ceva paccayo cāti veditabbāni. Pubbapayogādīnañhi sabbesaṃ
analyzed: ettha cha cīvarāni hetu ca iva paccayaḥ ca ati veditabbāni pubba payoga ādīnam hi sabbesam

analyzed: tāni yeva hetu tāni paccayaḥ na hi chabbidhe cīvare asati payogaḥ atthi na pubba karaṇa ādīni

analyzed: tasmā payogaḥ hetu nidānaḥ ti ādi vuttam

analyzed: saṅgaha vāre saṅghāṭiyā iminā uttarāsaṅgena iminā antaravāsakena

analyzed: paccuddhāro ca iva adhiṭṭhānañca

original: 411. Vatthuvipannaṃ hotīti akappiyadussaṃ hoti. Kālavipannaṃ nāma ajja dāyakehi dinnaṃ sve saṅgho kathinatthārakassa deti. Karaṇavipannaṃ nāma tadaheva chinditvā akataṃ.

original: Kathinādijānitabbavibhāgavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kathina ādi jānitabba vibhāga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: yat vattabbam sabbam kathinakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyam vuttam

original: 416. Ekuppādā ekanirodhāti uppajjamānāpi ekato uppajjanti, nirujjhamānāpi ekato nirujjhanti.
analyzed: eka uppādā eka nirodhā ti uppajjamānāḥ api ekatas uppajjanti nirujjhamānāḥ api ekatas nirujjhanti

original: Ekuppādā nānānirodhāti uppajjamānā ekato uppajjanti, nirujjhamānā nānā nirujjhanti.
analyzed: eka uppādā nānā nirodhā ti uppajjamānāḥ ekatas uppajjanti nirujjhamānāḥ nānā nirujjhanti

original: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Sabbepi atthārena saddhiṃ ekato uppajjanti, atthāre hi sati uddhāro

analyzed: pāpuṇanti atthārassa hi nirodhaḥ etesañca uddhāra bhāvaḥ eka kkhaṇe hoti itare nānā

original: Samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya
analyzed: samanta pāsādikāya vinaya saṃvaṇṇanāya

original: Kathinabhedavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kathina bheda vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

475. Pañca desanāgāminiyoti lahukā pañca. Cha sappaṭikammāti pārājikaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā. Ekettha appaṭikammāti ekā pārājikāpatti.

original: Vinayagarukā dve vuttāti pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Kāyavācasikāni cāti sabbāneva

original: nakhe ca chindantassa anāpatti. Chādentassa āpattīti attano āpattiṃ chādentassa aññesaṃ
analyzed: nakhe ca chindantassa anāpatti chādentassa āpatti iti attanaḥ āpattim chādentassa aññesam

original: vā āpattiṃ. Chādentassa anāpattīti gehādīni chādentassa anāpatti.
analyzed: vā āpattim chādentassa anāpatti iti geha ādīni chādentassa anāpatti

original: Saccaṃ bhaṇantoti gāthāya “sikharaṇīsi ubhatobyañjanāsī”ti saccaṃ bhaṇanto garukaṃ
analyzed: saccam bhaṇantaḥ iti gāthāya sikharaṇī asi ubhatobyañjanā asi iti saccam bhaṇantaḥ garukam

original: āpajjati, sampajānamusāvāde pana musā bhāsato lahukāpatti hoti, abhūtārocane musā
analyzed: āpajjati sampajāna musā vāde pana musā bhāsataḥ lahukā āpatti hoti a bhūta ārocane musā

original: bhaṇanto garukaṃ āpajjati, bhūtārocane saccaṃ bhāsato lahukāpatti hotīti.
analyzed: bhaṇantaḥ garukam āpajjati bhūta ārocane saccam bhāsataḥ lahuka āpatti hoti iti

original: (3) Pācittiyādipañhāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: pācittiya ādi pañhā vaṇṇanā

original: 481. Adhiṭṭhitanti gāthā nissaggiyacīvaraṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhitam iti gāthā nissaggiya cīvaram a nissajjitvā paribhuñjantam sandhāya vuttā

original: Atthaṅgate sūriyeti gāthā romanthakaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: atthaṅgate sūriya iti gāthā romanthakam sandhāya vuttā

original: Na rattacittoti gāthāya ayamattho – rattacitto methunadhammapārājikaṃ āpajjati. Theyyacitto
analyzed: na ratta cittaḥ ti gāthāya ayam atthaḥ ratta cittaḥ methuna dhamma pārājikam āpajjati theyya cittaḥ

original: adinnādānapārājikaṃ, paraṃ maraṇāya cetento manussaviggahapārājikaṃ, saṅghabhedako
analyzed: adinnādāna pārājikam param maraṇāya cetentaḥ manussa viggaha pārājikam saṅgha bhedakaḥ

original: pana na rattacitto na ca pana theyyacitto na cāpi so paraṃ maraṇāya cetayi, salākaṃ
analyzed: pana na ratta cittaḥ na ca pana theyya cittaḥ na ca api saḥ param maraṇāya salākam

original: panassa dentassa hoti chejjaṃ, pārājikaṃ hoti, salākaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa bhedakānuvattakassa thullaccayaṃ.
analyzed: panassa dentassa hoti chejjam pārājikam hoti salākam paṭiggaṇhantassa bhedaka anuvattakassa thullaccayam

original: Gaccheyya aḍḍhayojananti ayaṃ pañhā suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ ekakulassa rukkhamūlaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: gaccheyya aḍḍha yojanam ti ayam pañhā su patiṭṭhita nigrodha sadisam eka kulassa rukkha mūlam sandhāya vuttā

original: Kāyikānīti ayaṃ gāthā sambahulānaṃ itthīnaṃ kese vā aṅguliyo vā ekato gaṇhantaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: kāyikāni iti ayam gāthā sambahulānam itthīnam kese vā aṅguliyaḥ vā ekatas gaṇhantam sandhāya vuttā

original: Vācasikānīti ayaṃ gāthā “sabbā tumhe sikharaṇiyo”tiādinā nayena duṭṭhullabhāṇiṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: vācasikāni iti ayam gāthā sabbā tumhe sikharaṇiyā iti ādinā nayena duṭṭhulla bhāṇim sandhāya vuttā

original: Tissitthiyo methunaṃ taṃ na seveti tisso itthiyo vuttā, tāsupi yaṃ taṃ methunaṃ nāma,
analyzed: tissa itthiyaḥ methunam tam na seveti tissaḥ itthiyaḥ vuttā tāsu pi yam tam methunam nāma

original: taṃ na sevati. Tayo puriseti tayo purisepi upagantvā methunaṃ na sevati. Tayo anariyapaṇḍaketi
analyzed: tam na sevati tayo purisā iti tayo purisā api upagantvā methunam na sevati tayo anariya paṇḍakā iti

original: ubhatobyañjanasaṅkhāte tayo anariye tayo ca paṇḍaketi imepi cha jane upagantvā methunaṃ
analyzed: ubhatobyañjana saṅkhāte ca paṇḍaka iti ime api jane upagantvā methunam

original: na sevati. Na cācare methunaṃ byañjanasminti anulomapārājikavasenapi methunaṃ nācarati.
analyzed: na sevati na ca ācare methunam anuloma pārājika vasena api methunam na ācarati

original: Chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayāti siyā methunadhammapaccayā pārājikanti. Ayaṃ pañhā
analyzed: chejjam siyā methuna dhamma paccayā ati siyā methuna dhamma paccayā pārājikanti ayam pañhā

original: aṭṭhavatthukaṃ sandhāya vuttā, tassā hi methunadhammassa pubbabhāgaṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhavatthukam sandhāya vuttā tassāḥ hi methuna dhammassa pubba bhāgam kāya saṃsaggaṃ

original: āpajjituṃ vāyamantiyā methunadhammapaccayā chejjaṃ hoti.
analyzed: āpajjitum vā āyamantiyā methuna dhamma paccayā chejjam hoti

original: Mātaraṃ cīvaranti ayaṃ gāthā piṭṭhisamaye vassikasāṭikatthaṃ satuppādakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Vinicchayo panassā vassikasāṭikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanāyameva vutto.
analyzed: mātaram cīvaran ti ayam gāthā piṭṭhi samaye vassika sāṭika attham satuppāda karaṇam sandhāya vuttā vinicchayaḥ pana assā vassika sāṭika sikkhāpada vaṇṇanāyam eva vutto

original: Kuddho ārādhako hotīti gāthā titthiyavattaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Titthiyo hi vattaṃ pūrayamāno
analyzed: kuddhaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti iti gāthā titthiya vattam sandhāya vuttā titthiyaḥ hi vattam pūrayamānaḥ

original: titthiyānaṃ vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kuddho ārādhako hoti, vatthuttayassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne
analyzed: titthiyānam vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kuddhaḥ ārādhakaḥ hoti vatthuttayassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne

original: kuddho gārayho hotīti tatthevassā vitthāro vutto. Dutiyagāthāpi tameva sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: kuddhaḥ gārayhaḥ hoti iti tattha iva assā vitthāraḥ vuttaḥ dutiya gāthā api tam eva sandhāya vuttā

original: Saṅghādisesantiādi gāthā yā bhikkhunī avassutāva avassutassa purisassa hatthato piṇḍapātaṃ
analyzed: gāthā yā bhikkhunī avassutā ava avassutassa purisassa hatthato piṇḍapātam

original: gahetvā manussamaṃsalasuṇapaṇītabhojanasesaakappiyamaṃsehi saddhiṃ omadditvā ajjhoharati, taṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: gahetvā manussa maṃsa lasuṇa paṇīta bhojana sesa a kappiya maṃsehi saddhim omadditvā ajjhoharati tam sandhāya vuttā

original: Eko upasampanno eko anupasampannoti gāthā ākāsagataṃ sandhāya vuttā. Sace hi dvīsu
analyzed: ekaḥ upasampannaḥ ekaḥ anupasampannaḥ iti gāthā ākāsa gatam sandhāya vuttā sace hi dvīsu

original: sāmaṇeresu eko iddhiyā kesaggamattampi pathaviṃ muñcitvā nisinno hoti, so anupasampanno
analyzed: sāmaṇeresu ekaḥ iddhiyā kesagga mattam pi pathavim muñcitvā nisinnaḥ hoti saḥ an upasampannaḥ

original: nāma hoti. Saṅghenāpi ākāse nisīditvā bhūmigatassa kammaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Sace karoti, kuppati.
analyzed: nāma hoti saṅghena api ākāse nisīditvā bhūmi gatassa kammam na kātabbam sace karoti kuppati

original: Akappakatanti gāthā acchinnacīvarakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttā. Tasmiṃyeva cassā sikkhāpade vitthārena vinicchayopi vutto.
analyzed: gāthā acchinna cīvarakam bhikkhum sandhāya vuttā tasmin yeva ca ssā sikkhāpade vitthārena vinicchayaḥ api vutto

original: Na deti na paṭiggaṇhātīti nāpi uyyojikā deti, na uyyojitā tassā hatthato gaṇhāti.
analyzed: na deti na paṭiggaṇhāti iti na api uyyojikā deti na uyyojitā tassāḥ hatthataḥ gaṇhāti

original: Paṭiggaho tena na vijjatīti teneva kāraṇena uyyojikāya hatthato uyyojitāya paṭiggaho
analyzed: paṭiggahaḥ tena na vijjati iti tena iva kāraṇena uyyojikāya hatthataḥ uyyojitāya paṭiggahaḥ

original: na vijjati. Āpajjati garukanti evaṃ santepi avassutassa hatthato piṇḍapātaggahaṇe
analyzed: na vijjati āpajjati garukanti evam sante pi avassutassa hatthato piṇḍapāta ggahaṇe

original: uyyojentī saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjati. Tañca paribhogapaccayāti tañca pana āpattiṃ
analyzed: uyyojentī saṅgha ādi sesa āpattim āpajjati tat ca paribhoga paccayā ati tat ca pana āpattim

original: āpajjamānā tassā uyyojitāya paribhogapaccayā āpajjati. Tassā hi bhojanapariyosāne
analyzed: āpajjamānā tassāḥ uyyojitāya paribhoga paccayā āpajjati tassāḥ hi bhojana pariyosāne

original: uyyojikāya saṅghādiseso hotīti. Dutiyagāthā tassāyeva udakadantaponaggahaṇe uyyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttā.
analyzed: uyyojikāya saṅgha ādisesaḥ hoti iti dutiya gāthā tassāya iva udaka danta ponaggahaṇe uyyojanam sandhāya vuttā

original: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjanti sattarasakesu hi aññataraṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā
analyzed: na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjanti sattarasakesu hi aññataram āpattim āpajjitvā

original: anādariyena chādayamānāpi bhikkhunī chādanapaccayā vajjaṃ na phusati, aññaṃ navaṃ
analyzed: anādariyena chādayamānā api bhikkhunī chādana paccayā vajjam na phusati aññam navam

original: āpattiṃ nāpajjati, paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā āpattiyā pakkhamānattameva
analyzed: āpattim na āpajjati paṭicchannāya vā appaṭicchannāya vā āpattiyā pakkha mānattam eva

original: labhati. Ayaṃ pana bhikkhunīpi na hoti, sāvasesañca garukaṃ āpajjitvā chādetvā vajjaṃ
analyzed: labhati ayam pana bhikkhunī pi na hoti sa avasesam ca garukam āpajjitvā chādetvā vajjam

original: na phusati. Pañhā mesā kusalehi cintitāti ayaṃ kira pañhā ukkhittakabhikkhuṃ sandhāya
analyzed: na phusati pañhā mā esā kusalehi cintitā ati ayam kira pañhā ukkhittaka bhikkhum sandhāya

original: vuttā. Tena hi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ natthi, tasmā so saṅghādisesaṃ āpajjitvā chādento
analyzed: vuttā tena hi saddhim vinaya kammam na atthi tasmā saḥ saṅgha ādisesam āpajjitvā chādentaḥ

original: vajjaṃ na phusatīti.
analyzed: vajjam na phusati iti

original: Sedamocanagāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sā idam mocana gāthā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Pañcavaggo
analyzed: pañcavaggaḥ

original: Kammavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kamma vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 482. Kammavagge catunnaṃ kammānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ samathakkhandhake vuttameva. Kiñcāpi
analyzed: kamma vagge catunnam kammānam nānākaraṇam samatha khandhake vuttam eva kiñca api

original: vuttaṃ, atha kho ayaṃ kammavinicchayo nāma ādito paṭṭhāya vuccamāno pākaṭo hoti,
analyzed: vuttam atha kho ayam kammavinicchayaḥ nāma āditaḥ paṭṭhāya vuccamāno pākaṭaḥ hoti

original: tasmā ādito paṭṭhāyevettha vattabbaṃ vadissāma. Cattārīti kammānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedavacanametaṃ.
analyzed: tasmai āditaḥ paṭṭhāya iva itthā vattabbam vadissāma cattāri iti kammānam gaṇana pariccheda vacanam etam

original: Kammānīti paricchinnakammanidassanaṃ. Apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā
analyzed: kammāni iti paricchinna kamma nidassanam apalokana kammam nāma sīmaṭṭhaka saṅgham sodhetvā

original: chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā
analyzed: chandārahānam chandam āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattum sāvetvā

original: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya
analyzed: kattabbam kammam ñatti kammam nāma vutta nayena iva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya

original: ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa
analyzed: ñattiyā kattabbam kammam ñatti dutiya kammam nāma vutta nayena iva samaggassa saṅghassa

original: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti evaṃ ñattidutiyāya anussāvanāya kattabbaṃ
analyzed: anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāya ati evam ñatti dutiyāya anussāvanāya kattabbam

original: kammaṃ. Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya
analyzed: kammam ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vutta nayena iva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya

original: ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti evaṃ ñatticatutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbaṃ kammaṃ.
analyzed: ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhi iti evam ñatti catutthāhi tīhi anussāvanāhi kattabbam kammam

original: Tattha apalokanakammaṃ apaloketvāva kātabbaṃ, ñattikammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattikammampi
analyzed: tattha apalokana kammam apaloketvā ava kātabbam ñatti kamma ādi vasena na kātabbam ñatti kammam pi

original: ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Ñattidutiyakammaṃ
analyzed: ekam ñattim ṭhapetvā ava kātabbam apalokana kamma ādi vasena na kātabbam ñatti dutiya kammam

original: pana apaloketvā kātabbampi atthi, akātabbampi atthi.
analyzed: pana apaloketvā kātabbam pi atthi a kātabbam pi atthi

original: Tattha sīmāsammuti, sīmāsamūhananaṃ, kathinadānaṃ, kathinuddhāro, kuṭivatthudesanā,
analyzed: tattha sīmā sammuti sīmā samūhananam kathina dānam kathin uddhāraḥ kuṭi vatthu desanā

original: vihāravatthudesanāti imāni cha kammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭanti, ñattidutiyakammavācaṃ
analyzed: vihāra vatthu desanā ti imāni cha kammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātum na vaṭṭanti ñatti dutiya kamma vācam

original: sāvetvāva kātabbāni. Avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhakamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo
analyzed: kātabbāni avasesā terasa sammutiyaḥ senāsana ggāhaka mataka cīvara dāna ādi sammutiyaḥ

original: cāti etāni lahukakammāni apaloketvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭanti, ñattikamma-ñatticatutthakammavasena
analyzed: ca ati etāni lahuka kammāni apaloketvā api kātum vaṭṭanti ñatti kamma ñatti catuttha kamma vasena

original: pana na kātabbameva. Ñatticatutthakammavasena kayiramānaṃ daḷhataraṃ hoti, tasmā
analyzed: pana na kātabbam eva ñatti catuttha kamma vasena daḷhataram hoti tasmā

original: kātabbanti ekacce vadanti. Evaṃ pana sati kammasaṅkaro hoti, tasmā na kātabbanti
analyzed: kātabbanti ekacce vadanti evam pana sati kamma saṅkaraḥ hoti tasmā na kātabbanti

original: paṭikkhittameva. Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti,
analyzed: paṭikkhittam eva sace pana akkhara parihīnam vā pada parihīnam vā durutta padam vā hoti

original: tassa sodhanatthaṃ punappunaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Idaṃ akuppakammassa daḷhīkammaṃ hoti,
analyzed: tassa sodhana attham punappunam vattum vaṭṭati idam akuppa kammassa daḷhīkammam hoti

original: kuppakamme kammaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: kuppa kamme kammam hutvā tiṭṭhati

original: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ, apalokanakammādivasena na kātabbaṃ. Pañcahākārehi vipajjantīti pañcahi kāraṇehi vipajjanti.
analyzed: ñatti catuttha kammam ñattiñca tisso ca kamma vācāyo sāvetvā ava kātabbam apalokana kamma ādi vasena na kātabbam pañcahā ākārehi vipajjanti iti pañcahi kāraṇehi vipajjanti

original: 483. Sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammanti ettha
analyzed: sammukhākaraṇīyam kammam a sammukhā karoti vatthu vipannam adhamma kamman ti ettha

original: atthi kammaṃ sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ; atthi asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ; tattha asammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
analyzed: atthi kammam sammukhākaraṇīyam atthi a sammukhākaraṇīyam tattha a sammukhākaraṇīyam

original: nāma dūtenupasampadā, pattanikkujjanaṃ, pattukkujjanaṃ, ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattakasammuti,
analyzed: nāma dūtena upasampadā patta nikkujjanam patta ukkujjanam ummattakassa bhikkhuno ummattaka sammuti

original: sekkhānaṃ kulānaṃ sekkhasammuti, channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍo, devadattassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ,
analyzed: sekkhānam kulānam sekkha sammuti channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍaḥ devadattassa pakāsanīya kammam

original: appasādanīyaṃ dassentassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbaṃ avandanīyakammanti
analyzed: appasādanīyam dassentassa bhikkhunaḥ bhikkhuni saṅghena kātabbam a vandanīya kamman ti

original: aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, taṃ sabbaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi
analyzed: aṭṭhavidham hoti tat sabbam tattha tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbam idam aṭṭhavidham pi

original: kammaṃ asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hoti akuppaṃ.
analyzed: kammam a sammukhā katam su katam hoti a kuppam

original: Sesāni sabbakammāni sammukhā eva kātabbāni – saṅghasammukhatā, dhammasammukhatā,
analyzed: sesāni sabba kammāni sammukhā eva kātabbāni saṅgha sammukha tā dhamma sammukha tā

original: vinayasammukhatā, puggalasammukhatāti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ sammukhāvinayaṃ upanetvāva
analyzed: vinaya sammukha tā puggala sammukha tā ati imam catubbidham sammukha avinayam upanetvā ava

original: kātabbāni. Evaṃ katāni hi sukatāni honti. Evaṃ akatāni panetāni imaṃ sammukhāvinayasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: kātabbāni evam katāni hi su katāni honti evam akatāni pana itāni imam sammukha avinaya saṅkhātam

original: vatthuṃ vinā katattā vatthuvipannāni nāma honti. Tena vuttaṃ – “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
analyzed: vatthum vinā kata ttā vatthuvipannāni nāma honti tena vuttam sammukhākaraṇīyam

original: kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakamma”nti.
analyzed: kammam a sammukhā karoti vatthu vipannam adhamma kamman ti

original: Paṭipucchākaraṇīyādīsupi paṭipucchādikaraṇameva vatthu, taṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā
analyzed: paṭipucchākaraṇīya ādīsupi paṭipucchā ādi karaṇam eva vatthu tam vatthum vinā

original: tesampi vatthuvipannatā veditabbā. Idaṃ panettha vacanatthamattaṃ. Paṭipucchā karaṇīyaṃ

analyzed: kathin uddhāra vasena uddhāraḥ veditabbo kuṭi vatthu vihāra vatthu desanā vasena desanā

original: veditabbā. Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe
analyzed: veditabbā yā pana ekekasmin pakkhe

original: ekekaṃ ñattiñcāti tisso ñattiyo ṭhapetvā puna ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekā, ekasmiṃ pakkhe
analyzed: ekekam ñattiñca ati tissaḥ ñattiyaḥ ṭhapetvā punar ekasmim pakkhe ekā ekasmim pakkhe

analyzed: ekā ati dve ñatti dutiya kamma vācā vuttā tāsam vasena kamma lakkhaṇam veditabbam iti

original: ñattidutiyakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
analyzed: imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati

original: Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede pana tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena
analyzed: ñatti catuttha kammaṭṭhāna bhede pana tajjanīya kamma ādīnam sattannam kammānam vasena

analyzed: nissāraṇā tesam yeva ca kammānam paṭippassambhana vasena osāraṇā veditabbā bhikkhunovādaka sammuti vasena

analyzed: sammuti veditabbā parivāsa dāna mānatta dāna vasena dānam veditabbam mūlāya paṭikassana kamma vasena

analyzed: niggahaḥ veditabbaḥ ukkhitta anuvattikāḥ aṭṭha yāvatatiyakāḥ ariṭṭhaḥ caṇḍakāḷī ca ime

analyzed: te imāsam ekādasannam samanubhāsanānam vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā

original: Upasampadākammaabbhānakammavasena pana kammalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Iti ñatticatutthakammaṃ
analyzed: upasampadā kamma abbhāna kamma vasena pana kamma lakkhaṇam veditabbam iti ñatti catuttha kammam

original: imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
analyzed: imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati

original: 497. Iti kammāni ca kammavipattiñca vipattivirahitānaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānapabhedagamanañca
analyzed: iti kammāni ca kamma vipattim ca vipatti virahitānam kammānam ṭhāna pabheda gamanam ca

analyzed: dassetvā idāni tesam kammānam kārakassa saṅghassa paricchedam dassento puna catu vagga karaṇe

analyzed: attha vasa vagga ādi vaṇṇanā

original: Vipākadukkhāneva pana akkhamaṭṭhena samparāyikaakusalānīti vuccanti, tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya.
analyzed: vipāka dukkhāna eva pana akkhamaṭṭhena samparāyika akusalāni iti vuccanti tesam paṭighāta tthāya

analyzed: osāraṇīyam paññattam yena kammena osārīyati tam kammam paññattanti atthaḥ nissāraṇīyam

analyzed: sesam sabbattha uttānam eva ati

analyzed: ānisaṃsa vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Yasmā pana dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipattiyā saṅgahitā, pañcāpattikkhandhā ācāravipattiyā,

analyzed: yasmā pana satta hāpattīhi muttam eka sikkhāpadam pi natthi tasmā sabbāni āpattiyā saṅgahitāni iti evam āpatti saṅgahaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Sabbāni ca sattasu nagaresu paññattānīti nidānena saṅgahitānīti evaṃ nidānasaṅgaho veditabbo.

analyzed: yasmā pana eka sikkhāpadam pi ajjhācārika puggale asati paññattam natthi tasmā sabbāni puggalena saṅgahitāni iti evam puggala saṅgahaḥ veditabbaḥ

analyzed: saṅgahitāni evam ettha khandha samuṭṭhāna adhikaraṇa samatha saṅgahā api veditabbā sesam

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Parasamayavivajjanato, sakasamayavisuddhito ceva.

original: Viññūnamayaṃ tasmā, samantapāsādikātveva.

original: Vuttassa lokanāthena, lokamanukampamānenāti.
analyzed: vuttassa lokanāthena lokam anukampamānena ati

original: Mahāaṭṭhakathañceva, mahāpaccarimevaca;

original: Kurundiñcāti tissopi, sīhaḷaṭṭhakathā imā.

original: Buddhamittoti nāmena, vissutassa yasassino;

original: Mahāmeghavanuyyāne, bhūmibhāge patiṭṭhito;

original: Anākulāya saddhāya, pasanno ratanattaye.

original: Upaddavā kule loke, nirupaddavato ayaṃ;

original: Saddhammabahumānena, yañca puññaṃ samācitaṃ.

original: Bhavantu dhammarājassa, saddhammarasasevino.
analyzed: bhavantu dhammarājassa saddhamma rasa sevino

original: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medininti.
analyzed: tappetu devaḥ dhammena rājā rakkhatu medinin ti

original: Paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
analyzed: parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditena

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede
analyzed: saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhaṇa samatthena paññā veyyattiya samannāgatena ti piṭaka pariyat tippa bhede

original: sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihataññāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇena karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanalāvaṇṇayuttena
analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihata ññāṇa ppabhāvena mahā veyyākaraṇena karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacana lāvaṇṇa yuttena

original: yuttamuttavādinā vādivarena mahākavinā pabhinnapaasambhidāparivāre chaḷabhiññādipabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite
analyzed: yutta mutta vādinā vādi varena mahā kavinā pabhinna paa sambhidā parivāre chaṣ abhiññā ādi pabheda guṇa paṭimaṇḍite

original: uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
analyzed: uttari manussa dhamme su patiṭṭhita buddhīnam thera vaṃsa ppadīpānam therānam mahāvihāra vāsīnam

original: vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
analyzed: vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhūtena vipula visuddha buddhinā buddha ghosaḥ iti garūhi gahita nāmadheyyena

original: therena katā ayaṃ samantapāsādikā nāma vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā –
analyzed: therena katā ayam samantapāsādikā nāma vinaya saṃvaṇṇanā

original: Tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, lokanittharaṇesinaṃ;
analyzed: tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmim loka nittharaṇa īsinam

original: Dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ sīlavisuddhiyā.
analyzed: dassentī kula puttānam nayam sīla visuddhiyā

original: Yāva buddhoti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino;
analyzed: yāva buddhaḥ ti nāmam pi suddhacittassa tādinaḥ

original: Lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti.
analyzed: lokamhi loka jeṭṭhassa pavattati mahesino ti

original: Samantapāsādikā nāma
analyzed: samantapāsādikā nāma

original: Vinaya-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
